name: Come-Unity Cooperative Care (CCC)
description: Nonprofit Christian organization dedicated to meeting the basic needs of low-income families. Provides food distribution center, thrift store, emergency food assistance program (TEFAP), and grocery pickup services. Serves the London, Kentucky community with food assistance, clothing, and basic needs support. Community-based organization helping families in crisis.
source: Verified from official Facebook page, website, and cross-referenced with multiple sources
notes: Verified information from official Facebook page (https://www.facebook.com/p/Come-Unity-Cooperative-Care-100064702059334/), Laurel County Chamber of Commerce listing, and multiple directory sources. Organization provides food distribution, thrift store services, and emergency assistance to low-income families. Contact person: Linda Lipps. Services include TEFAP (The Emergency Food Assistance Program) and grocery pickup. Highly rated with 4.5/5 stars from 57 reviews.
